thread.title: WATCH: Scared of flying? Hair-raising landing in violent storm will give you shivers
thread.title_full: WATCH: Scared of flying? Hair-raising landing in violent storm will give you shivers

title: WATCH: Scared of flying? Hair-raising landing in violent storm will give you shivers
text:
WATCH: Scared of flying? Hair-raising landing in violent storm will give you shivers WATCH: Scared of flying? Hair-raising landing in violent storm will give you shivers THIS is the moment a pilot's skills were pushed to the limit as he landed a plane in record-breaking winds. PUBLISHED: 02:57, Tue, Jul 28, 2015 | UPDATED: 10:04, Tue, Jul 28, 2015 YOUTUBE The plane veers sharply between touching the tarmac 
The passenger jet is shown rocking from side to side as it tries to make its nerve-wracking arrival to Amersterdam's Schipol Airport.Dozens of flights had been delayed during the 75mph gales and heavy downpours, but one skilful KLM pilot bravely managed to navigate stormy weather. Related articles
